summary.para: Retrieves the credential object for the specified URL.

param.name: pszUrl
param.para: A null-terminated wide-character string containing the URL for which the credential is needed.

param.name: pszRealm
param.para: A null-terminated wide-character string containing the realm for the authentication.

param.name: dwAuthenticationFlags
param.para: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

param.name: ppCred
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

param.name: pdwRequirementsFlags
param.para: Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Reports whether the credential object provided successfully passed the authentication challenge.

param.name: fGood
param.para: TRUE if the credential object succeeded in the authentication challenge; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: This method is called by the network source into the credential manager.

summary.para: Specifies how user credentials are stored.

param.name: pCred
param.para: Pointer to the interface. Obtain this pointer by calling .

param.name: dwOptionsFlags
param.para: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: If no flags are specified, the credentials are cached in memory. This method can be implemented by the credential manager and called by the network source.

summary.para: Gets credentials from the credential cache.

This interface is implemented by the credential cache object. Applications that implement the interface can use this object to store the user's credentials. To create the credential cache object, call .
